column4: So yeah... Intel 4500MHD, Overscan using Panasonic 42 inch 1080p through HDMI.  Laptop has broken screen, have TV set to be only output. Have Xorg.conf, -NO- Modes listed for any color depth, and am unsure of how to attain a proper mode as I don't have the manual, and Google curses me out telling me this is only a 720p tv which is INCORRECT, because I'm rendering in 1080p right now with overscan, 720p yields the same, -and- my ps3 uses the
Bluebaron, install Cygwin, or use the KDE installer for windows.
